src_text: Re lemogile ditekodi i o t e di dirilwego ke ditheo t a bodit ha haba t a kelo ya seemo sa ekonomi e lego Fitch, Standard & Poor s le Moody s, t eo di tii eledit ego leswa kelo ya sekoloto sa Afrika Borwa go maemo a peelet o le go t wet a pele maemo a ka moso a yona ao a sa tekatekeg Ditekodi i o t a kelo di tii et a gore mo omo wo o dirwago ke mmu o go feto a seemo sa ekonomi le go fa naga sekgoba seo se hlokagalago sa gore e t wele pele go tsenya tiri ong maano a yona a go tsena seemo ka bogar Mo omo wa boikgafo wa Team South Africa wo o bopilwego ke mmu o, lefapha la kgwebo le la ba omi o netefat a gore Afrika Borwa e efoga kelo ye e bolelago gore ekonomi e phuhlamil Afrika Borwa e tsenya tiri ong mananeo go t wa ka go Leanotlhabollo la Boset haba (NDP) ao a tlago netefat a gore naga e dula e le naga yeo babeelet i ba dinaga t a ka ntle ba tlago nyaka go beelet a go yon Se se laet a gore ka go

trg_text: The Report on the Extent of Desertification in South Africa and its impact on the rural economy and related strategies being implemented to address these challengeThe effects of Desertification, Land Degradation and Drought impede efforts aimed at poverty eradication, safeguarding food security, enhancing water quality and quantity, resilience and adaptation to climate change as well as achieving sustainable developmenIn this regard, South Africa has introduced a number of legislative tools, policies, strategies and practical programmes aimed at addressing desertification and land degradation at all level These interventions contribute to conservation and socio-economic upliftment while creating job opportunities, skills development and enhancing livelihood The release of this report contributes to recognition of June 17 as the World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought, which was proclaimed by the UN General Assembl This year s World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought advocates for the importance of inclusive cooperation to restore and rehabilitate degraded land and contribute towards achieving the overall Sustainable Development Goal In doing so, South Africa fulfils its obligations under the UN Convention to Combat Desertificatio The response report to issues received from the UN Committee on the Rights of the Child, was approve This relates to the second report on implementation of the Convention on the Rights of the Child and the Optional Protocol on the Sale of Children, Child Prostitution and Child PornographThese will be considered at the 73rd Session to be held in Geneva from 13 to 30 September 2016.

to the following: Saharawi people on the passing away of President Mohamed Abdelazi Browde family on the passing of Advocate Jules Browde SC who represented thousands of people who faced eviction from their homes under the Group Areas Act at the height of political repression during aparthei Advocate Browde represented several anti-apartheid activists, including former African National Congress Presidents Nelson Mandela and Oliver Tamb He was also a founding member of Lawyers for Human Right Family, friends and religious community on the passing of Reverend Dr Simon Gqubul He was one of the country s leading religious leaders, academics and liberation struggle stalwart Dr Gqubule was awarded the Order of Luthuli in Silver on 28 April 2016 by the President, in recognition of his excellent contribution to the liberation struggle and to the field of education and religio Family and friends of veteran actor and director Nyembezi Kunene, who died after a long illnes Kunene had an illustrious career and significantly contributed to the advancement of the local film industr Family and friends of former Bafana Bafana coach, Ted Dumitru, who had a stellar career coaching Kaizer Chiefs, Mamelodi Sundowns and Orlando Pirate He also coached Bafana Bafana at the 2006 Africa Cup of Nation Family, friends and people of Nigeria on the loss of Nigerian soccer legend, Stephen Kesh He won the Africa Cup of Nations as both a player and coach, and contributed to soccer in Africa and the worl We also join the global community in paying tribute to the former heavyweight boxing champion and international sports icon Muhammad Al Ali was an inspiration to many people around the world and used his position to champion the fight for civil rights, justice and equality AppointmentsAll appointments are subject to the verification of qualifications and the relevant clearanc National Empowerment Fund:Ms Philisiwe Mthethwa reappointed as the Chief Executive Officer (CEO).

src_text: Batho ba Afrika Borwa ka moka ba bolokegile ebile ba ikwa ba bolokegile .. Mabapi le taba ya temo o ya ka ditiro t a bot ho et i ye e filwego ke Botseta bja United States (US) ka Pretori Kabinete e bu elet a seo se bolet wego ke Kantoro ya Mopresidente gore Lefapha la T hirelet o le kopane maabane go ahlaahla taba ye go t wela pele, ka nepo ya go netefat a gore go ba le polokego ye e t welago pele go bohle ka nagenGodimo ga fao, Mmu o wa Afrika Borwa o tla t wela pele go ahlaahla taba ye le Mmu o wa US bjalo ka karolo ya tiri ano ye e t welago pele ka ga merero ya t hirelet o magareng ga dinaga t e ka bobed Afrika Borwa le US di t wela pele go ba le dikamano t e tiilego le t a tiri ano ka mafapheng a mehutahuta a tiri ano go akaret wa merero ya sepolotiki, ekonomi, leago le ya t hirelet .
trg_text: All people in South Africa are and feel safe .. On the matter of the terror alert issued by the United States (US) Embassy in Pretori Cabinet reiterates the statement issued by The Presidency that the Security Cluster met yesterday to discuss the matter further, with a view to ensuring the continued safety of all in the countrIn addition, the South African Government will continue to discuss the matter with the US Government as part of ongoing cooperation on security issues between the two countrie South Africa and the US continue to enjoy strong and cordial relations in various areas of cooperation including political, economic, social and security matter.

src_text: Bafsa ba I a pele Afrika Borwa .Ditiragalo t e bohlokwa di tla akaret a Polelo ya Let at i ka Mopresidente le moletlo wa go bea dikgare ka Leswikeng la Hector Pieterso Khonferentshe ye e kgethegilego ya ba kga o e tla swarwa ka Labobedi la 14 Phupu 2016 go fa dintlha ka botlalo ka ga Lenaneo la Let at i la Bafs Ditona le Batlat aditona ba be ba boledi ana le batho ba rena, kudukudu le bafsa mo kgweding ye go ba hlohlelet a go
trg_text: We Love Our Tradition, We Value Life of Our Youth .Families, parents and legal guardians must ensure that the young men only choose legally operating initiation schools, where pre-screening is done, and surgeons are well trained and well known by parent Communities are requested to report any illegal activities on 0800 111 166 or #zero tolerance on initiation deaths Key Cabinet decisions The President of the Republic of South Africa, President Jacob Zuma, was selected to the Heads of State High Level Panel on Water; and the Director-General of the Department of Water and Sanitation was appointed as Sherpa (a civil servant or diplomat who undertakes preparatory work prior to a summit conference) to the President of South Africa as a Panel Member to the High Level Panel on WateThe United Nation s Secretary-General s (UNSG) Advisory Board on Water and Sanitation recommended the establishment of a select Heads of State High Level Panel on Water to lead the advocacy initiative on water and adaptation, following the adoption of the 2030 Development Agenda by the UNSG in September 2015.The panel will accelerate the implementation of the Sustainable Development Goal 6 (clean water and sanitation), which has renewed focus on the profound impact of climate change on the water cycl It is in this light and given the persistent drought that is experienced across the country, that Team South Africa is encouraged to participate in the cleaning up of rivers, streams and wetlands on 18 July, as part of South Africa s annual Mandela Day activitie The Communication Strategy on the NDP Vision 2030 highlights the implementation of the NDP and will communicate the impact of the NDP on South African A special media briefing will be held to unpack the communication strategy, use of the logo, branding guidelines and applications to ensure a uniformed communication approach across all government departments and implementing agencie
